Text: Roosevelt stuffThank you for returning the paperwork to me They are installing hardwoods on th floor right now I was down there this am The Lobby is completejust some touch up needed Elevator is up running At this time we need you to identify a Lender and get yourself preapproved and have the Lender preapprove the project Because it is a conversion some Lenders have trouble doing the loan Jerry Wilson of Pacific Northwest Mortgage Inc has preapproved this project and is doing a number of other loans at the Roosevelt In case youd like his number it is or pager Tell him you are calling re Roosevelt Let me know which Lender you are working with and I will give them the necessary info about the building Thanks Kirstin Boettcher for Jeff Burghart PC The Hasson Company Realtors PS Didnt see ya walking for MS Late night he he he JK
